content.question: Which of the following best summarizes Nazi aims in the systematic killing of millions of Jews along with large numbers of communists, disabled people, Gypsies, homosexuals, Jehovah's Witnesses, and socialists?

choices.label: To fulfill the terms of the Nazi-Soviet Pact
To eliminate allegedly inferior and undesirable peoples
To prevent these people from collaborating with the Allies
To meet the demands of the German electorate
To prevent the rest of the civilian population from defecting to the Allies

content.answer: To eliminate allegedly inferior and undesirable peoples
